rukus.text: (I swear by the angels) _ those who (violently) wrench out (the souls of the unbelievers)
And those who (gently) draw out (the souls of the believers)
Those who swiftly glide along (in the universe)
Those who rush to carry out
And execute the commands (of the Lord)
That day, (the Day of Decision), a violent jolt will rock (the earth)
And another (jolt) will (soon) follow
That day, hearts would pound (in panic)
And eyes would drift downward (with dread)
They are saying, "What? Would we really be restored back to our former (state of) existence
Even after we are (just) crumbling bones
They say, "Such a (revival and) recurrence is hence a losing proposition
(In fact), it will just take a single rebuke
And at once they will appear on the surface
Has the story of Musa reached you
His Lord summoned him to the holy valley of ´Tuwa´
(And said), "Go to the pharaoh, he is really rebellious
And ask him, "Are you willing to accept purity
(If so), I will guide you towards your Lord; fear Him
And Musa showed him the great sign
But the pharaoh denied and disobeyed
And turned back to hatch a scheme
Then he assembled (his cronies) and announced
He said, "I am your Lord, the most high
So, (as a punishment), Allah turned him into an example in the afterlife, as well as in this life
Of course, there is a lesson in it for all who fear (the reckoning)
